title: NCAAM TOURNAMENT: Notre Dame falls to Texas Tech in Round of 32 - Washington Times Herald
content:

description: With two minutes left, Notre Dame freshman Blake Wesley stood at the free-throw line looking to give the Fighting Irish a two-possession lead over Texas Tech.
